description: Oats make a great base for these gluten free apple and cinnamon pancakes.
name: Cinnamon, Apple & Oat Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red apple, peeled, cored and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Tip the oats into a food processor and blitz to a fine flour consistency. Whisk the oat flour, baking powder and cinnamon together in a large bowl. Add the egg, milk, apple cider vinegar, apple and vanilla to the food processor and blitz until smooth.
Tip the flour mix into the food processor and blend for 10 seconds to combine.

Heat the butter in a large non-stick pan on medium heat and add ladlefuls of batter to the pan. Cook for 2-3 minutes until bubbles form, flip and cook for 1-2 minutes on the other side or until golden brown. Serve with maple syrup.
